Greetings to Jordanian Prime Minister and Minister of Defense
    Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Faisal al Fayez on his appointment as prime minister and minister of defense of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would expand and develop in different fields, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

Paek Nam Sun Meets Indonesian Delegation
    Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a conversation with the delegation of the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Director General for Asia Pacific and Africa Makarim Wibisono on November 13.
 Present there were an official concerned and the Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK.
